description: Independent use of this facility is limited to students registered on specific courses within the School of Arts, Media & Communication. Our UHD/4K ready, broadcast standard Media Studio, provides our students with multiple opportunities to be creative, producing a body of work that showcases the breadth of their diverse craft skills. It provides access to state-of-the-art TV and Media Production technologies and equipment required for the production of high-quality Broadcast, TV, Radio and Digital Media audiovisual content. It is a highly flexible environment where all audio and video feeds can be configured via hardware and software routing.
